reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Tellink
reauth_confirm.description: Your credentials are missing or invalid. Please enter a new password for {username}.

reauth_required.title: Tellink needs reauthentication
reauth_required.description:
The Tellink integration "{entry_title}" for user **{username}** is missing credentials or they are no longer valid.

Click **Fix** to enter a new password and restore connectivity, or open the Tellink integration from Settings â†’ Devices & Services.
